name: Keyboard Dungeon
description:
In Keyboard Dungeon, the keyboard is your dungeon!

Make and break friendships along the way as you use every corner of your keyboard to solve fiendish puzzles.

Input

  • Shift+R : Reset level
  • Escape : Menu
  • Move maybe? : 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0,q,w,e,r,t,y,u,i,o,p,a,s,d,f,g,h,j,k,l,;,',z,x,c,v,b,n,m,,,..

Credits

Aubrey Bryan - Art, voice
Robin Smekens - Tech
Elain Wang - Voice
Rick Meeuwes - Level design, music and sounds, voice

Deleting Save Data
1. Find folder via windows file explorer
C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Local\KeyboardDungeon\Saved\SaveGames
(can also be accessed via %appdata%)
2. Delete Default.sav
